channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 早盘：中国采购经理人指数、美联储声明将测试增长前景
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 星巴克销售额因需求放缓而低于预期，中国经济复苏提振股价
item.description: Starbucks missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly sales on Tuesday, in a sign that demand for its pricey coffees and cold drinks in the U.S. might be hitting a roadblock, while its international markets also faced a slowdown.翻译:星巴克周二的季度销售额未达到华尔街预期，这表明美国对其昂贵咖啡和冷饮的需求可能遇到障碍，而其国际市场也面临放缓。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 雪佛龙将哈萨克斯坦石油改道至非洲周边的亚洲 - 消息来源，伦敦证券交易所集团数据
item.description: Chevron is sending cargoes of Kazakhstan's CPC Blend oil to Asia around Africa's Cape of Good Hope rather than via the Red Sea to avoid the risk of attacks by Yemen’s Houthis, according to three industry sources and LSEG ship-tracking data.翻译:据三位行业消息人士和伦敦证券交易所集团船舶跟踪数据称，雪佛龙正在将哈萨克斯坦的 CPC Blend 石油货物沿着非洲好望角而不是通过红海运往亚洲，以避免也门胡塞武装发动袭击的风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着电动汽车需求放缓，行业痛苦加剧
item.description: While automakers are betting big on future demand for EVs, a near-term global slowdown is causing pain.翻译:尽管汽车制造商对电动汽车的未来需求下了很大的赌注，但近期的全球经济放缓正在带来痛苦。
item.author: Nick Carey, Joseph White

item.title: 博尔顿在新回忆录介绍中称特朗普“不适合”担任总统
item.description: Former U.S. National Security Adviser John Bolton excoriated former President Donald Trump as an utterly self-interested man who would punish personal enemies and appease adversaries Russia and China in a new edition of his memoir released on Tuesday.翻译:美国前国家安全顾问约翰·博尔顿在周二发布的新版回忆录中痛斥前总统唐纳德·特朗普是一个完全自私的人，他会惩罚私人敌人并安抚对手俄罗斯和中国。
item.author: Arshad Mohammed, Steve Holland

item.title: IMF称全球“软着陆”在望，上调2024年增长前景
item.description: The International Monetary Fund upgraded the outlook for both the United States and China.翻译:国际货币基金组织上调了美国和中国的前景展望。
item.author: Rachel Savage, Andrea Shalal

item.title: 国际货币基金组织上调亚洲增长预测，警告中国风险
item.description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) on Tuesday projected emerging Asian economies would expand 5.2% this year, slowing from 2023 but revised up from its forecast three months ago on stronger-than-expected growth in China.翻译:国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 周二预计亚洲新兴经济体今年将增长 5.2%，较 2023 年有所放缓，但因中国经济增长强于预期而上调了三个月前的预测。
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 中美芬太尼合作北京期待“正能量”
item.description: The U.S. and China launched a joint counter-narcotics working group on Tuesday in the first overt sign of cooperation in tackling the spread of fentanyl since late 2019, before bilateral relations between the superpowers soured.翻译:周二，美国和中国成立了联合禁毒工作组，这是自 2019 年底以来两个超级大国双边关系恶化之前首次公开合作应对芬太尼泛滥。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾空军展示潜猎预警能力
item.description: Taiwan's air force showed off its armed-to-the-teeth submarine hunters and early warning and control aircraft on Tuesday, demonstrating how it keeps watch on the skies and waters around the Chinese-claimed island.翻译:周二，台湾空军展示了全副武装的潜艇猎手以及预警和控制飞机，展示了它如何监视中国声称拥有主权的岛屿周围的天空和水域。
item.author: Fabian Hamacher

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商宁德时代预计2023年盈利增长放缓
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle (EV) battery giant CATL forecast net profit growth of up to 48.1% in 2023 on Tuesday, representing sharply weaker growth than the previous year as it grappled with slowing demand and stiff competition.翻译:中国电动汽车 (EV) 电池巨头宁德时代 (CATL) 周二预计 2023 年净利润增长高达 48.1%，由于需求放缓和激烈竞争，该公司的增长大幅低于上年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：退款燃料、大型股更新、中国陷入困境
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国将批准欧盟计划中的人工智能法案
item.description: Germany will approve the European Union's pioneering AI Act after the minister responsible for digital issues said a compromise had been reached.翻译:在负责数字问题的部长表示已经达成妥协后，德国将批准欧盟开创性的人工智能法案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度4-12月钢铁进口量创五年新高 需求猛增
item.description: India's steel imports touched a five-year high in the first nine months of the fiscal year to the end of March, turning the country into a net importer of finished steel, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:路透社周二看到的临时政府数据显示，截至3月底的本财年前9个月，印度钢材进口量触及五年来新高，使该国成为成品钢材净进口国。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 恒大清算凸显投资者对中国债务的绝望
item.description: A liquidation order for China's most debt-laden developer begins a drawn-out process for creditors that is likely to lay bare the depths of China's real-estate downturn and leave builders locked out of global debt markets as investors shun exposure.翻译:中国负债最重的开发商的清算令开始了债权人漫长的程序，这可能会暴露出中国房地产低迷的严重程度，并导致建筑商因投资者回避风险而被排除在全球债务市场之外。
item.author: Laura Matthews, Tom Westbrook

item.title: 随着中国工厂假期临近，红海危机预计将推高空运价格
item.description: Global air freight rates have climbed for the first time in seven weeks ahead of Asia's Lunar New Year factory closures and as attacks on Red Sea shipping prompt companies to secure costlier air cargo space.翻译:在亚洲农历新年工厂关闭之前，全球空运价格出现七周以来的首次攀升，而红海航运的袭击促使公司获得更昂贵的航空货运舱位。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Lisa Baertlein

item.title: 印度限制措施推动巴基斯坦大米出口创历史新高
item.description: Pakistan's rice exports are likely to jump to a record high in the year ending in June as rival India's decision to curb its own shipments forces buyers to purchase more from Islamabad, which is offering the grain at nearly 16 year-high prices.翻译:巴基斯坦的大米出口量可能会在截至 6 月份的一年中跃升至历史新高，因为其竞争对手印度决定限制本国的出货量，迫使买家从伊斯兰堡购买更多大米，而伊斯兰堡以近 16 年来的最高价格提供谷物。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav, Ariba Shahid

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 所谓的中国支持的黑客组织 Volt Typhoon 是什么？
item.description: Networks controlled by a pervasive Chinese hacking group dubbed "Volt Typhoon" have been disrupted by a U.S. government operation, Reuters exclusively reported on Monday.翻译:据路透社周一独家报道，美国政府的一项行动已经扰乱了一个名为“Volt Typhoon”的中国黑客组织控制的网络。
item.author: Raphael Satter, James Pearson
